about.details:
Established in September 2023, Capital Infra Trust is an infrastructure investment trust sponsored by Gawar Construction Limited. The InvIT was established to engage in activities and make investments as an infrastructure investment trust, as allowed under the SEBI InvIT Regulations.

The sponsoring company specializes in constructing road and highway projects across 19 states in India for various government bodies, including the NHAI, MoRTH, MMRDA, and CPWD.

As of December 2024, the sponsor company's portfolio of 26 road projects on a hybrid annuity mode (“HAM”)with NHAI, of which 11 are completed projects, including the five acquired assets which Sadbhav Infrastructure Project Limited erstwhile owned, and 15 under-construction projects.

The Trust received a rating of ‘Provisional CRISIL AAA/Stable (Assigned)’ from CRISIL Ratings Limited for the Trust NCD(s) and proposed long-term bank loan facility on November 11, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the Capital Infra Trust Invit?
faqs.answer:
Capital Infra Trust Invit is a main-board InvIT of 157800000 equity shares of the face value of ₹99 aggregating up to ₹1,578.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹99 per share. The minimum order quantity is 150.

The InvIT opens on January 7, 2025, and closes on January 9, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the InvIT. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Capital Infra Trust Invit through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Capital Infra Trust Invit using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Capital Infra Trust Invit by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Capital Infra Trust Invit through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Capital Infra Trust Invit' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Capital Infra Trust Invit will open?
faqs.answer: The Capital Infra Trust Invit opens on January 7, 2025 and closes on January 9, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Capital Infra Trust Invit?
faqs.answer: Capital Infra Trust Invit lot size is 150, and the minimum amount required is ₹15,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Capital Infra Trust Invit?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Capital Infra Trust Invit online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Capital Infra Trust Invit allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Capital Infra Trust Invit will be done on Tuesday, January 14, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, January 16, 2025. Check the Capital Infra Trust Invit allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Capital Infra Trust Invit listing date?
faqs.answer: The Capital Infra Trust Invit listing date is on Friday, January 17, 2025.
